reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel Regent nearby the Munich airport was a very pleasant surprise! Amazing 2-floor suite at a very reasonable room rate, wifi & excellent restaurant. The communication was very good & The Regent has the transportation to/from the airport REALY figured out; they were most accomodating. Can't say enough good things about this outstanding hotel & will definately stay on our next trip to Munich. HIGHLY recommend the Hotel Regent! Marcy & Bob, Scottsdale, Arizona, USA
reviews.title: Hotel Regent in Munich was outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel for our last stay of our European vacation and couldn't have been more pleased. The front desk staff were really friendly and attentive right from the start. And we were quickly shown the room and settled in. The first floor room was very clean, comfortable and not noisy at all. Great size and comfortable bed. We had an issue come up on our end early in the evening and the staff were so great at helping us out. A big thank you to them. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone for any reason. The restaurant across from it is pretty good too.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Near Airport

reviews.text: Ok budget airport hotel. Rooms actually quite good, but I have never met such complacent staff in my life! I guess they think that people will come anyway, given that they're an airport hotel.... Simple requests were just too much trouble for the staff... This is just the sort of hotel that's thrived until now, but that trip advisor will hopefully put out if business (or sharpen-up their act). Book elsewhere if you can.
reviews.title: Book elsewhere if you can. Rude, lazy staff - they couldn't care less!

reviews.text: A very strange layout for a hotel. It is almost as if the idea of a hotel was more of an after thought. It is a cluster of 3 buildings with the reception is in one, the restaurant in an other across the car park and the room that I stayed in in the 3rd building............ not the German standards for perfection. None the less, it is great value for money. Neat & comfortable rooms and the service is alright.
reviews.title: Airport Regentpark Hotel

reviews.text: We found this place on line as it was near the airport and not super expensive. Ended up being a strange place but kind of cool. Confused as to which building to go to at first. One is the restaurant, one is the office, and down the street are the apartments with the rooms. Actually down and around the corner, we had to take a golf cart. You can walk, not too far. Rooms were great, modern, roomy, residential. Kids were a bit loud at night playing so used earplugs. Room has nice shower and minibar and a kitchen. Dinner was good back in the one house, breakfast was average but okay. Front desk staff nice and helpful. Restaurant staff is average. Shuttle to airport was great. we dropped off rental and came back to hotel so next day we didn't need to worry about the car. If you call the hotel they send the shuttle. We prearranged for the shuttle to airport and picked the time we wanted. Worked well. Really is a cute and unusual place, sort of has a polo theme, owners must have been into that sport. Would probably stay here again.
reviews.title: Strange hotel but in a good way

reviews.text: We booked 2 nights at this hotel in september.
reviews.title: Ok for a night between flights

reviews.text: The room was clean, good size.Polite reception staff, good and prompt airport transfer.
reviews.title: Decent value but staff need customer service training

reviews.text: Quiet area.
reviews.title: Better than a hostel, but not much

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurant Staff is not friendly.
reviews.title: Big disappointment

reviews.text: On Saturdays and public holidays the restaurant only offers vegetable soup, pizza margherita and 3 salads, we walked a bit and did not find any restaurant nearby.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL NEAR AIRPORT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are several hotels in Hallbergmoos which would be a far better choice than this one.
reviews.title: Hotel Regent or Regent Park, same place!

reviews.text: They charge extra for everything, the public areas and around the buildings are a mess and the staff in the reception area are decidedly unhelpful and arrogant,specifically Jasmine whom I would think twice about in having her represent my business..
reviews.title: A Good hotel with bad staff

reviews.text: VERY arrogant staff. The highway exit to the village is closed at the moment but no word on it in the website who sold me the deal.
reviews.title: Handy to airport and good value

reviews.text: Other than that, it is a nice private hotel.
reviews.title: Good travel Hotel for Airport

reviews.text: Wotrh the money. Just ignore the staff.
reviews.title: Great Non-Chain Airport Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is terrible. I was staying here on business for nearly a month and I had to deal with the rude and obnoxious staff for way too long. Upon arrival, one is not acknowledged nor greeted. You have to vow for the attention of a staff member, only to be spoken to in a rude irritable tone. You are charged for the use of internet, but this is limited to one device, so no laptop and iphone for example. When questioning this policy you are promptly disciplined on the hotel policies. I was automatically charged for 25 breakfasts, even though I only had two during my stay and when i was checking out, my payment made by my company previously was refused, because there was no "written" consent for the credit card payment.
reviews.title: STAY AWAY

reviews.text: A load of laundry will cost you 48 euros so beware. And after paying for the airport shuttle, you are told that "we'll see how many people show up, then we'll go", nevermind about the flight you need to catch. I travel a lot on business and i must say staying here was truly unpleasant because of the staff. I have never experienced anything like this before.
reviews.title: Great for Munich airport

reviews.text: The rooms have noisy water pipes and are adjacent to a workshop, where steel grinding starts at 6 a.m every morning without fail. Noisy to say the least.
reviews.title: Great Location - Wonderful Staff

reviews.text: If you speak English only, you are treated in an even more dis-tasteful manner.
reviews.title: Not quite what I expected

reviews.text: The room was large and clean, shuttle service was good and cheap (only charge one fee for all in your party, I think it was only 6 euros). The buildings are quaint. Check in was a bit confusing, it was hard to tell where the reception building was. Our taxi driver was very confused. Staff was not too friendly but efficient. Didn't try the breakfast so can't comment on that. The lobby/reception building has cats roaming around in it, so maybe not good for allergy sufferers, but it was clean. The value for the cost was good, we would stay here again if flying in or out of Munich, was good for an overnight stay.
reviews.title: Cheap close to airport
